dialog: Haven't seen you around here before.
Good afternoon. How may I help you?
Thank you for choosing our store. What can I get for you today?
I'm sorry, we've run out of that, may I help you choose something different?
Are there any particular items I can help you find?
I am currently engaged and will help you momentarily.
AP_Tasks: Order an item from a shop
Engage a Bard for a song
Engage a Mercenary for a job
Listen to the newest gossip around town
Offer a person in need some change
Learn wise knowledge from the Duck
Role_Tasks: Convince a customer to buy [an] item
Tell customers about a sale you have
